_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the time-series event.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The time when an event or observation occurred.

eventType.title: Event Type
eventType.description: The primary event type for this time-series record.

eventMergeId.title: ExperienceEvent merge ID
eventMergeId.description: An ID to correlate or merge multiple Experience events together that are essentially the same event or should be merged. This is intended to be populated by the data producer prior to ingestion.

leadSource.title: Lead Source
leadSource.description: Source from where this perticlar lead come from.

createdDate.title: Created Date
createdDate.description: Date when this lead is created.

directMarketing.title: Direct marketing
directMarketing.description: Events and properties related to direct and outbound marketing such as email, direct mail, texts, and in-app notifications.

emailBouncedCategory.title: Email Bounced Category
emailBouncedCategory.description: Category in which this email failure belongs.

emailBouncedSubcategory.title: Email Bounced Subcategory
emailBouncedSubcategory.description: Subcategory this failure reason belongs to.

testVariantID.title: Test Variant ID
testVariantID.description: Unique identifier for the test variant.

testVariantName.title: Test Variant Name
testVariantName.description: Friendly name for the test variant.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: The information related to web page and link of the ExperienceEvent.

operatingSystem.title: Operating system
operatingSystem.description: The name of the operating system used when the observation was made. The attribute should not contain any version information such as '10.5.3', but instead contain 'edition' designations such as 'Ultimate' or 'Professional'.

browserDetails.title: Browser details
browserDetails.description: The browser specific details such as browser name, version, javascript version, user agent string, and accept language.

userAgent.title: User agent
userAgent.description: The HTTP user-agent string from the client request.

ipV4.title: IPv4
ipV4.description: The numerical label assigned to a device participating in a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication.

device.title: Device
device.description: An identified device, application or device browser instance that is trackable across sessions, normally by cookies.

model.title: Model
model.description: The name of the model for the device. This is the common, human-readable, or marketing name for the device. For example, the 'iPhone 6S' is a particular model of mobile phone.

web.title: Web
web.description: The information related to web page and link of the ExperienceEvent.

name.title: Name
name.description: The normative name of the web page. This name is not necessarily the page title or directly associate with page content, but is used to organize a site's pages for classification purposes.

queryParamaters.title: Query Paramaters
queryParamaters.description: Query Paramters used for the web page.

URL.title: URL
URL.description: The normative or usual URL of the web page.  This may or may not be the actual URL used to reach the page, which would be recorded using `Web Link`.

isPersonalizedURL.title: Is Personalized URL
isPersonalizedURL.description: Personalized URL of the web page.  This may or may not be the actual URL used to reach the page, which would be recorded using `Web Link`.

isSuccessful.title: Is Successful
isSuccessful.description: Is the change successful or failed in process.

search.title: Search
search.description: The information related to web or mobile search.

searchEngine.title: Search engine
searchEngine.description: The search engine used by the search.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.description: Information related to advertising activity in ExperienceEvents.

alertClicks.title: Alert Clicks
alertClicks.description: Counts the number of times an alert has been clicked.

alertDismissals.title: Alert Dismissals
alertDismissals.description: Counts the number of times an alert has been dismissed.

alertImpressions.title: Alert Impression Details
alertImpressions.description: An array of alerts that have been displayed to a customer.

application.title: Application
application.description: This mixin is used to capture application information related to an ExperienceEvent, including the name of the application, app version, installs, launches, crashes, and closures. It could be either the application targeted by the event like the send of a push notification or the application originating the event such as a click, or a login.

cardApplicationSteps.title: Card Application Steps
cardApplicationSteps.description: Extension of form application data type.

creditLimitIncrease.title: Credit Limit Increase
creditLimitIncrease.description: Extension of form application data type.

channel.title: Experience channel
channel.description: Experience channel related to the ExperienceEvent.

claimID.title: Claim ID
claimID.description: ID of the claim being submitted.

claimStartDate.title: Claim Start Date
claimStartDate.description: Date the claim was successfully submitted.

claimStatus.title: Claim Status
claimStatus.description: Captures the status of the claim for any given point in the application process.

productListItems.title: Product list items
productListItems.description: A list of items representing a product selected by a customer with specific options and pricing that are for that usage context at a specific point of time and may differ from the product record.

commerce.title: Commerce
commerce.description: Commerce specific data related to this event.

placeContext.title: Place context
placeContext.description: The transient circumstances related to the observation. Examples include locale specific information such as weather, local time, traffic, day of the week, workday vs. holiday, and working hours.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: The information related to marketing activities that are active with the touchpoint.

media.title: Media
media.description: Media activity information related to the experience event.

segmentMemberships.title: Segment Memberships
segmentMemberships.description: The segments associated with this ExperienceEvent. Deprecated, use `xdm:segmentMembership` instead.

dataSource.title: Data source
dataSource.description: Globally unique identification of a data source.

receivedTimestamp.title: Received time stamp
receivedTimestamp.description: The time at which this interaction was received by a server.

chatDeclined.title: Chat Declined
chatDeclined.description: Captured when an offered chat is declined by a visitor.

chatEnd.title: Chat End
chatEnd.description: Captured when a chat is ended with a visitor.

chatOffered.title: Chat Offered
chatOffered.description: Captures the number of times a chat session has been offered to a visitor.

chatSessionID.title: Chat Session ID
chatSessionID.description: Captures the chat session identifier, if available.

chatStart.title: Chat Start
chatStart.description: Captured when a chat is initiated with a visitor.

clickToCall.title: Click to Call
clickToCall.description: Visitor initiates a call to the client from a telephone number link on the site/app.

clickToDirectMessage.title: Click to Direct Message
clickToDirectMessage.description: Visitor initiates a direct message or feedback to the client from a direct message form on the site/app.

clickToEmail.title: Click to Email
clickToEmail.description: Visitor initiates an email to the client from an email link on the site/app.

clickToText.title: Click to Text
clickToText.description: Visitor initiates a SMS/text message to the client from a SMS/text link on the site/app.

Subject.title: Subject
Subject.description: Subject of contact requested by the visitor, such as in-store purchase support, online order support, credit customer service, etc.

callBackNumber.title: Call Back Contact Information
callBackNumber.description: The contact phone number the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

replyToEmailAddress.title: Reply to Email Address
replyToEmailAddress.description: The email address the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

endUserIDs.title: End-User IDs
endUserIDs.description: Condensed, normalized encapsulation of all end-user identifiers. Deprecated, use `xdm:identityMap` instead.

implementationDetails.title: Implementation details
implementationDetails.description: The details of the software used to collect the ExperienceEvent.

profileStitch.title: Profile stitch
profileStitch.description: Details about the IDs that were joined by profile stitching.

pushNotificationTracking.title: push notification tracking details
pushNotificationTracking.description: Describes interaction with a push notification.

customAction.title: custom action
customAction.description: End user clicked custom action in the push notification

value.title: value
value.description: value associated with the custom action, if any

pushProviderMessageID.title: Push Provider message ID
pushProviderMessageID.description: ID assigned to this notification as assigned by the push provider

pushProvider.title: Push Provider
pushProvider.description: Push provider, e.g. apns or fcm
